page.title: 09EVENTS
page.content: EDUCATIONAL. Chiefly annual events from Newton School, including:- 5-day trip to Holland, Field Week at Richmond, York (Upper Juniors), 6-day trip to London, a Music Morning at Carr Hill High School each July for all Primary schoolchildren in Division 4 of L.E.C., an inter-schools Rounders Rally in June, an inter-schools Football Tournament in May and a Netball Tournament in April. RELIGIOUS. Harvest Festival Services are held in Lund Church annually in September and a Harvest Supper in the Newton School.There is a Christingle Service every Christmas Eve. OCCASIONAL. In November 1977, the extreme south of the block was affected by the River Ribble bursting its banks and flooding
